sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167510 (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FORM_CD, FNM, RESNO, TNM, BSNO_ENC_CNTN, TDMR_DDC_AMT, PBT_DDC_AMT, DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT, TOTA_SNW_AMT, MINM_USE_AMT, DDC_EXCL_AMT, DDC_PSB_AMT, DDC_LMT_AMT, GNRL_DDC_AMT, TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT, PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT, LST_DDC_AMT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) VALUES (#dpobCd#, #yrtxBlggYr#, #clutSeptCd#, #systemkey#, #formCd#, #fnm#, #resno#, #tnm#, #bsnoEncCntn#, #tdmrDdcAmt#, #pbtDdcAmt#, #drtpCardDdcAmt#, #totaSnwAmt#, #minmUseAmt#, #ddcExclAmt#, #ddcPsbAmt#, #ddcLmtAmt#, #gnrlDdcAmt#, #tdmrAddDdcAmt#, #pbtAddDdcAmt#, #lstDdcAmt#, #kybdr#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167510 SET DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#, YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr#, CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd#, SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#, FORM_CD = #formCd#, FNM = #fnm#, RESNO = #resno#, TNM = #tnm#, BSNO_ENC_CNTN = #bsnoEncCntn#, TDMR_DDC_AMT = #tdmrDdcAmt#, PBT_DDC_AMT = #pbtDdcAmt#, DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT = #drtpCardDdcAmt#, TOTA_SNW_AMT = #totaSnwAmt#, MINM_USE_AMT = #minmUseAmt#, DDC_EXCL_AMT = #ddcExclAmt#, DDC_PSB_AMT = #ddcPsbAmt#, DDC_LMT_AMT = #ddcLmtAmt#, GNRL_DDC_AMT = #gnrlDdcAmt#, TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT = #tdmrAddDdcAmt#, PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT = #pbtAddDdcAmt#, LST_DDC_AMT = #lstDdcAmt#, KYBDR=#kybdr#, INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr#, ISMT=#ismt#, REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FORM_CD, FNM, RESNO, TNM, BSNO_ENC_CNTN, TDMR_DDC_AMT, PBT_DDC_AMT, DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT, TOTA_SNW_AMT, MINM_USE_AMT, DDC_EXCL_AMT, DDC_PSB_AMT, DDC_LMT_AMT, GNRL_DDC_AMT, TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT, PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT, LST_DDC_AMT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM YE167510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FORM_CD, FNM, RESNO, TNM, BSNO_ENC_CNTN, TDMR_DDC_AMT, PBT_DDC_AMT, DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT, TOTA_SNW_AMT, MINM_USE_AMT, DDC_EXCL_AMT, DDC_PSB_AMT, DDC_LMT_AMT, GNRL_DDC_AMT, TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT, PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT, LST_DDC_AMT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM YE167510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
